attributes.action: all clinics in the north yorkshire area should give couples 3 free goes of IVF on the NHS!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as it stands north yorkshire pct does not offer couples the legal amount of free nhs goes for ivf. it should be allowing all couples 3 free goes on the nhs for ivf/icsi. the guidelines state that all uk pct's should be allowing couples 3 free goes.this is terrible and needs to be changed, they are one of a few pct's in the uk that are not allowing infertile couples the chance to become paretns. its disgraceful. this must be changed.

rejection.details: You may instead wish to sign this petition, which covers this issue in a national context: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/funding4ivf/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
